sourcesContent:
<template>
    <button class="btn" :class="[`btn-${type}`, `btn-${size}`]" @click="handleClick">
        {{ label }}
    </button>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        props: {
            label: String,
            type: {
                type: String,
                validator(value) {
                    return [
                        "primary",
                        "outline-primary",
                        "link",
                        "tertiary",
                        "secondary",
                    ].includes(value);
                },
                default: "primary", // Default value if not provided
            },
            size: {
                type: String,
                validator(value) {
                    return ["sm", "md", "lg", "xl"].includes(value);
                },
                default: "md", // Default value if not provided
            },
        },
        methods: {
            handleClick() {
                // Handle button click event
                // You can add your custom logic here
                this.$emit("click");
            },
        },
    };
</script>

<style scoped>
    .btn {
        /* Add your button styles here */
        padding: 10px 20px;
        border: none;
        border-radius: 5px;
        cursor: pointer;
    }

    /* Example button type styles */
    .btn-primary {
        background-color: blue;
        color: white;
    }

    .btn-outline-primary {
        background-color: transparent;
        border: 2px solid blue;
        color: blue;
    }

    .btn-link {
        background-color: transparent;
        border: none;
        color: blue;
        text-decoration: underline;
    }

    /* Example button size styles */
    .btn-sm {
        font-size: 14px;
    }

    .btn-md {
        font-size: 16px;
    }

    .btn-lg {
        font-size: 18px;
    }

    .btn-xl {
        font-size: 20px;
    }
</style>
